name: Ninja Run (itch) (DarkCoffii, Tyler Gonsalves, Alexa Faulkner, DoubleBrackets)
name_original: Ninja Run (itch) (DarkCoffii, Tyler Gonsalves, Alexa Faulkner, DoubleBrackets)
description:
Oh no! Your house has been overrun with ninjas, and it's up to you to protect it!

Gameplay heavily inspired by Katana: Zero

Developer's best time is 150 seconds, try and beat it :>

Made with Pico-8 for CDM-176 Game Platforms Course
